column4: I have registered a domain name. I was thinking about setting up a mail server and I have a question. what happends if my server is down for a little while when receiving a imporante mail? will it just dissapear or reapparea?
whenever the server is down, unless there are backups, there's nothing on your end to receive it. So it's always going to be in the sender's court
no, gmail has a service where you can use their gmail servers with your own domain name
Even my University has switched over to gmail servers! (though for a fee, since we have thousands of accounts)
